pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, March 22, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Trois-Rivières, Quebec

Private meetings.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement and hold a media availability. He will be joined by Premier of Quebec François Legault, Minister of Innovation, Science and Industry François-Philippe Champagne, and Member of the National Assembly for Orford and Parliamentary Assistant to the Premier of Quebec Gilles Bélanger.

Delta Hotel Trois-Rivières
1620, rue Notre-Dame Centre
Trois-Rivières

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 1:15 p.m.

Ottawa, Ontario

The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

Closed to media.
